solution_line_template: In the next {days_next} days, Jane sews {dresses_per_day_next} * {days_next} = <<{dresses_per_day_next}*{days_next}={dresses_second_period}>>{dresses_second_period} dresses
Jane sews a total of {dresses_first_period} + {dresses_second_period} = <<{dresses_first_period}+{dresses_second_period}={total_dresses}>>{total_dresses} dresses
Jane uses a total of {total_dresses} * {ribbons_per_dress} = <<{total_dresses}*{ribbons_per_dress}={total_ribbons}>>{total_ribbons} ribbons
